language of characters geometry uses:
*geo + metri = earth + measurement

characters used for labelling measurements:
*point = definition, zero dimensions, limited in motion, for references
*line segment = one dimension, the connection of points, arrow, ends at both points
*ray = point forming infinite line in one direction, ends at one point
*line = points forming infinite lines in both directions, never ends


piece of paper = plane segment
third dimension = three dimensional space, (left + right, up + down, + in + out)
more than three dimensions = higher mathematics
